row.Docu:
This task will move to /adqa/ on client Check for a file to run a Quality Assessment on. If a file does not exist this task will move on with no error. If a file exists it will be DQA'ed/ADQA'ed
TIP: File must be present and must line up with stream in order to be process correctly. Stream and File variables are passed in from Parent object.
This is a TEAM STANDARD task used for all ADQA processing of files. DO NOT MAKE CHANGES without considering how it will affect all ADQA automation.

row.process:
:SET &DATE# = SYS_DATE("YYYYMMDD") :PRINT &DATE#
:SET &STREAM_LIST# = "" :SET &STREAM_LIST_HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&DATASOURCE_VARIABLE_NAME#) :PROCESS &STREAM_LIST_HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&STREAM_LIST_HND#,1) : IF &STREAM_LIST# <> "" : SET &STREAM_LIST# = STR_CAT(&STREAM_LIST#,",") : ENDIF : SET &STREAM_LIST# = STR_CAT(&STREAM_LIST#,&LINE#) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &STREAM_LIST_HND#
:IF &STREAM_LIST# <> "" cd /healthcare/&CLIENT#/adqa
streamlist=""
for stream in $(echo &STREAM_LIST# | sed "s/,/ /g") do
! Clear out prior stream reports. for adqafile in /healthcare/&CLIENT#/adqa/auto/${stream}/*&DATE#*.* do if [ -f $adqafile ] ; then echo "Attempting to remove $adqafile" rm $adqafile ; fi done
! Check current directory for target file to dqa or ADQA str_file=$( sed -n '6p' ~/df/${stream}/${stream}.str )
file=$( echo $str_file | awk -F"," '{print $1}')
if [ -f $file ] then FILESIZE=$(wc -l "$file" | awk -F" " '{print $1}') if [[ "$FILESIZE" -ne 0 ]]; then ! run DQA for Target Stream if [ -z "$streamlist" ]; then echo "Skipping adding comma, string empty" else streamlist="${streamlist}," fi streamlist="${streamlist}${stream}" echo $streamlist else echo "Zero records in source file. Skipping run dqa/adqa." fi fi done
echo $streamlist
if [ -z "$streamlist" ]; then echo "No streams to run through ADQA." else &UC_JOBMD CMD="export PATH=$PATH:/healthcare/&CLIENT#/bin:/oracle/dev/bin:/oracle/dev/OPatch:/sbin:/usr/local/bin; python /healthcare/cpm_shared/adqa/adqa_queue.py &CLIENT# $streamlist &AUTOMIC# --threadlimit 8 " fi :ENDIF
